p: In the study by Soubh et al. (2015), rats were treated with the standard drug sulfasalazine (500 mg/kg p.o.), geraniol (250 mg/kg p.o.), or a combination of geraniol with the standard drug, for 11 days. Trinitrobenzene sulphonic acid (TNBS) was instilled on the eighth day, shortly before administration of treatment.
